item.title: Debuggin Linux Kernel using JTAG (In ARM)
item.description: Build a kernel with symbols. make menuconfig -> kernel hacking -> Select Compile the kernel with debug info. This will create a elf image (vmlinux) with can be understood by the trace32. The best choice is to use a uncompressed kernel. ake the following changes to cmm files. Remove the aborts. Aborts are normal after mmu is initalized, so if you let the Debugger break for aborts, you will be aborting for ever.
